Description:
Detects relevant ClamAV messages

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Relevant ClamAV Message
Query: sourcetype='linux-clamav' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%trojan*found%' or log like '%virtool*found%' or log like '%webshell*found%' or log like '%rootkit*found%' or log like '%htran*found%')
